data.actual_result: both are connected and will eventually get a connecting loop if on phones; if on pc and phone the phone will get disconnected but the vc diaglogue sticks
data.expected_result: the first device shouldve disconnected and the second one should be in vc
data.short_description: User doesn't get disconnected when on different account, different result when on pc
data.steps_to_repro: - have 2 devices on the same account - have one connect to a vc (always android)  - have the other connect to a different vc in the same server (Android or pc)- observe both devices
